title: Spotted: Prototype Continental Tires on Jim Monro’s Atherton DH Bike at Snowshoe
content:
At the 2021 Downhill World Cup finale in Snowshoe, Bikerumor Editor Jordan Villella got eyes on a number of bikes and components yet to be released to the public. Prototype Ohlins electronic suspension, prototype Giant DH bikes, and these prototype Continental Downhill Tires were all hiding in plain sight. Ronan Dunne’s Nukeproof Dissent and Jim

The post Spotted: Prototype Continental Tires on Jim Monro’s Atherton DH Bike at Snowshoe appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
